scripts.dev:dev: cross-env BRANCH=dev concurrently -n server,client -c green,cyan "npm run dev --prefix server" "npm run dev --prefix client"
scripts.dev:main: cross-env BRANCH=main concurrently -n server,client -c green,cyan "npm run dev --prefix server" "npm run dev --prefix client"
scripts.dev:build: cross-env BRANCH=build concurrently -n server,client -c green,cyan "npm run dev --prefix server" "npm run dev --prefix client"
